name: Isometric Map Icons
description:
Isometric map icons for BIND (or any RPG).
It's still a work in (stalled) progress, so if you have something to add to the collection (or just a good idea for Inkscape filters) give me a shout, and give back to the map.

The Licence is CC-BY-SA. Remember to credit the artist (not me).

Full repo here: https://gitlab.com/bindrpg/isometric-map-icons
